Trigger/Context: Tracking nomad caravan; party searching for lost item, rumor, or escort
Effect/Outcome: Entry negotiation (ID check, weapons check), forced travel with pack, risk of violence if trust broken; possible were-creature ambush
Local_Faction/NPC: Local Nomad Pack, Sentries, Pack Leader
Vs_Stat/Check: Awareness (find camp, spot sentries), Persuasion (gain entry), Stealth (avoid notice)
DV: Difficult (spot sentries), Easy (track pack), Persuasion as needed
Special_Notes: Travel required by tradition; trust issues can escalate to deadly violence; possible supernatural elements (were-panther, hunter)

Trigger/Context: Nomad group traveling through hostile urban turf
Effect/Outcome: Violence, calls for government aid, possible escalation to public spectacle
Special_Notes: Early event in nomad history, sparks national controversy, may trigger further urban violence

Trigger/Context: Government attempts forced relocation for aid ("Cor-N-Kibble"); overcrowding, deprivation, disease
Effect/Outcome: Riot, mass starvation, outbreaks (AIDS 2, Typhoid Beta), guards attacked, high casualties
Local_Faction/NPC: Camp guards, displaced persons, government agents
Vs_Stat/Check: COOL (riot control), Awareness (disease signs), BODY (survive deprivation)
Special_Notes: Millions die before camps revolt or collapse; government overwhelmed

Effect/Outcome: Mass burials required, labor contracts to nomads, escalates local family rivalry
Special_Notes: Nomad contract leads to interfamily skirmishes, sets stage for mobile nomad economy

Trigger/Context: Seeking out gambler for info; must bribe barkeep, navigate local suspicion
Effect/Outcome: Possible betrayal, gambling debts, escalation to chase/violence
Special_Notes: Gambler always over his head, info may be unreliable; can trigger further hooks

Trigger/Context: Gathering at carnival site; multiple parties converge for confrontation/negotiation
Effect/Outcome: Multiple encounters possible: duel, betrayal, law enforcement arrival, sudden violence
Local_Faction/NPC: Local Fixers, Carnival staff, The Marquis, Tommy Lee
Special_Notes: Multi-threaded outcome—may gain loot, lose key NPCs, spark local rumor

Trigger/Context: Party follows trail of rumors or missing persons into undercity/sewers
Effect/Outcome: Combat with mutated threats or escaped experiments, risk of disease or contamination
Local_Faction/NPC: Mutants, escaped test subjects, local outcasts
Special_Notes: Potential for rare loot, connections with underworld; exposure can have lasting effects

Source: [TBD]（Neo-Tribes, not included in snippet—request for full table if needed）
Trigger/Context: Travelers flagged down for help, trade, or scam
Effect/Outcome: Possible ambush, genuine plea for aid, barter event, or setup for ongoing relationship
Special_Notes: Event may be repeatable; risk/reward varies by approach
